description: ProcessingModeOptions defines if headers or body should be processed by the external service and which attributes are sent to the processor

attributes.description: Defines which attributes are sent to the external processor. Envoy Gateway currently supports only the following attribute prefixes: connection, source, destination, request, response, upstream and xds.route. https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/intro/arch_overview/advanced/attributes
